sentences.english: Chinese people has never regarded human beings as the hightest creature among everything else since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 中华民族自古以来从来不把人看作高于一切。

sentences.english: Brilliance Auto has two complete vehicle brands of "Brilliance" and "Jinbei".
sentences.chinese: 华晨汽车拥有“中华”和“金杯”两大整车品牌。

sentences.english: Tea is one of the greatest cultural treasures of Chinese civilization.
sentences.chinese: 茶是中华文明最宝贵的文化财富之一。

sentences.english: Economic factor is an internal basic factor in the cohesion of the Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 经济因素是中华民族凝聚力的内在的基本因素。

sentences.english: However, a series of food safety incidents has damaged the country's reputation for fine cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 然而，一系列食品安全事件却令中华美食名声受损。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter is on establishing a contemporary Chinese cultural symbol system.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是创造中华民族的当代艺术符号语言。

sentences.english: The Chinese nation has always been ceremonies, reciprocity has become habit.
sentences.chinese: 中华民族素来是礼仪之邦，礼尚往来早已成为习惯。

sentences.english: Chinese medical knowledge surpasses science and includes the science of human body!
sentences.chinese: 中华医道超越科学，并可包容人体科学。

sentences.english: The Chinese culture advocates "harmony and accord".
sentences.chinese: 中华文化有尚“和”的传统。

sentences.english: The Chinese Hamster belongs to a group known as Rat-like hamsters.
sentences.chinese: 相比之下，中华仓鼠是和老鼠更为相似的一种仓鼠。

sentences.english: Respecting the old and caring for the young is a traditional Chinese virtue.
sentences.chinese: 尊老爱幼是中华民族的传统美德。

sentences.english: Wudang Golden Hall is the gem of Chinese nation.
sentences.chinese: 武当金殿是中华民族的国之瑰宝。

sentences.english: Mr Wu will be in charge of the company development in new business of big China division.
sentences.chinese: 吴先生将负责公司在大中华区新业务的开发。

sentences.english: Criteria of Seawater Quality of the P. C. C.
sentences.chinese: 中华人民共和国海水水质标准。

sentences.english: The traffic on the South Zhongshan Road near the Zhonghua Gate is jammed.
sentences.chinese: 中山南路中华门段上有交通堵塞。

sentences.english: Smooth and beautiful, Zhonghua high quality pencil!
sentences.chinese: 中华铅笔，品质优良，书写润滑，美观大方。

definition: Greater China/refers to China, Taiwan, Hong Kong and Macau (esp. in finance and economics)/refers to all areas of Chinese presence (esp. in the cultural field), including parts of Southeast Asia, Europe and the Americas
descendants of the Fiery Emperor and the Yellow Emperor (i.e. Han Chinese people)
division of China during earliest dynasties/fig. ancient China/Kyūshū, southernmost of Japan's four major islands
Central Plain, the middle and lower regions of the Yellow river, including Henan, western Shandong, southern Shanxi and Hebei
Celestial Empire, tributary title conferred on imperial China/Taiping Heavenly Kingdom
a flourishing period/period of prosperity/a golden age
